title: Zscaler Internet Access - SaaS Security
description: This dashboard provides a comprehensive view of SaaS application usage and security events as observed through Zscaler Internet Access (ZIA).

definition.content:
[Zscaler Internet Access](https://www.zscaler.com/products-and-solutions/zscaler-internet-access) (ZIA) is a secure Internet and web gateway delivered as a service from the cloud.

This dashboard provides deep visibility into SaaS application usage and security events captured by Zscaler Internet Access, enabling organizations to monitor data sharing, collaboration patterns, threat detection, and policy enforcement across cloud-based services.

For more information, see the [Zscaler Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/z-scaler/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.
